text: The 2018–19 National Basketball League (Bulgaria) season was the 78th season of the Bulgarian NBL. Balkan Botevgrad won its fifth national title. ==Teams== The same nine teams of the previous seasons repeated participation in the 2018–19 edition. {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center;" |- ! Club ! Last season ! Arena ! Location !
